entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:10 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
